name: Stefanie Neubert
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: Used it in frameworks (AngularJS, VueJS) for 3.5 years (I'm a full-time web/cordova-based-app developer). I did not learn how to use it, just googled what I needed.
what_can_i_contribute: Participate in discussions and learn about clean and easy-to-read code, best practices
